TitlePage.Acknowledgements: The authors are grateful to Sebastian Gutsche, Christof Söger and Max Horn for endowing GAP with a 4ti2-Interface and a normlaiz-Interface. We also would like to thank Gutsche and Söger for many very helpful discussions. We also want to give credits to the developers of the softwares 4ti2 and normaliz. Thanks go to David Avis for writing lrslib and answering our questions about it. We moreover thank Wolfgang Kimmerle for introducing us to the beautiful world of group rings. The development of this package was partially supported by the Research Foundation Flanders (FWO - Vlaanderen) and the DFG priority program SPP 1489 Algorithmic and Experimental Methods in Algebra, Geometry, and Number Theory.
